snippet.title: Yarimono | ヤリモノ キミが掴むのは　希望の未来か　終わりの絶望か | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The protagonist's life takes a turn after their partner #Yarimon learns the ultra-invincible 'cheat Tackle' Constantly challenging various trainers to participate in the Yarimon tournament, 
the protagonist unexpectedly discovers the secrets of this world in the process.

+・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・+
